title: ‘It’s Developing Faster Than We Expected’: Thibau Nys Destined for the Top in Road and ‘Cross
content:
The son of cyclocross legend Sven Nys has the punch and the engine to make waves on both sides of the sport.

Read the full article at ‘It’s Developing Faster Than We Expected’: Thibau Nys Destined for the Top in Road and ‘Cross on Velo.
author: sstokes
